name: Blockheads 4K version
description:
Written for the Reset64 4k competition but downloadable here for everybody.

When I first started coding this game I was playing a lot of Celeste and was inspired by the very tricky levels which weren't frustrating thanks to their short nature and quick restart. So I wrote this small game with 5 single player levels where you can challenge yourself to be the best times per level.

The game also features 5 two player levels in a split screen format so you can race your friends.

If you find the game too difficult there's a casual mode with no death. Alternatively if you're the kind of player who's collected every strawberry and C-side in Celeste there's a crazed mode which makes the levels even harder.
